subject: Re: [junit] Quick question regarding testing using ANT and Junit
msgSnippet: In your junit task, set showoutput= true . For example:  ...  Regards, - John ... [Non-text portions of this
messageBody:
In your junit task, set showoutput="true".

For example:

<junit printsummary="on"
showoutput="true">
...
</junit>

Regards,

- John
>
